response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and uniqueness, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering this, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you for $120. This is a special opportunity to acquire the product at a value slightly above its worth to you, while allowing us to fairly compensate for our efforts and resources. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.", "product_price": 120}
